candidates.name: Kaya Blown
candidates.why_elect: I work as Operations Manager of a small seafood factory processing cockles. What I do basically is organise everything so it works together for the whole teams success. I'd love a chance to do this for the region I call home.
candidates.why_stand: I love Golden Bay and I have been unhappy with how our council has implemented some policies in our area. There seems to be a real lack of caring of how these policies affect the people the council represents, so I decided to do something about it.

candidates.name: Celia Butler
candidates.why_elect: As a home visiting health professional I have got to know a broad cross section of the community, especially families and the practical challenges such as roading of more remote areas. I am a small business owner, have national and local governance experience and am involved in conservation work.
candidates.why_stand: Because Golden Bay needs a councillor who will listen to all sectors of the community, build relationships, understand the issues and act through the council process to get solutions.

candidates.name: Reg Turner
candidates.why_elect: Having the history of my professional and political history to date and living in Golden Bay for 12 years, witnessing the loss of power and control of our community by the bureaucracy, I wish to restore the control of our future with your support.
candidates.why_stand: Having travelled the world and experienced many careers from RAF officer to flying instructor, to tourist pioneer in the hospitality industry, I have settled in Golden Bay which is God's gift to NZ and I wish to keep it that way.
